detail_desc: Sleeveless, knee-length dress in airy chiffon with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt with an asymmetric hem. Jersey lining.
Shorts in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and appliqués. Side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a cotton jersey top and cotton velvet dungaree dress. Long-sleeved, patterned top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Dungaree dress with adjustable straps with a press-stud, front pockets and an opening with a concealed press-stud on one side.
Jumper in a textured, premium cotton knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hat in braided paper straw with a hole pattern, indented crown and braided band. Width of brim 3.5 cm.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow, detachable shoulder strap, flap with a magnetic fastener, and two inner compartments. Lined. Size 15x20 cm.
Boxy jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a high polo-neck, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
Scarf in a soft, loose weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 100x200 cm.
Long jersey T-shirt with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
All-in-one suit in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems, and press-studs on one shoulder, at the crotch and down the legs. Soft brushed inside.
Tube scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere. Width 24 cm, circumference approx. 42 cm.

Strapless balconette bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening and silicone trim at the back.

V-neck blouse woven in a crinkled cupro blend with a collar, wrapover top with a draped effect, long sleeves and wide cuffs with a slit and button. Seam with concealed elastication at the waist, a decorative knot detail at one side, and a lower section with an asymmetric cut at the front of the hem.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a cotton blend containing glittery threads.
Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Key pocket in the waistband.
Wide, long-sleeved jumper in a soft, rib knit containing some wool.

Jacket in imitation leather with a matching belt that has a covered buckle. Collar, covered buttons down the front, and flap chest and front pockets with a concealed press-stud. Gently dropped shoulder seams and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Lined.

Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with an imitation suede flap with a compartment and decoration on the front and magnetic fastener. Narrow shoulder strap at the top and card compartments inside. Lined. Size approx. 5x11x17 cm.
Wide top in soft, crêped viscose jersey with short cap sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Long metal earrings with plastic beads and pendants in different lengths of metal chain. Length 10.5 cm.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short, fitted turtleneck top in soft jersey.
Trousers in an airy weave with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, fake front pockets and a fake back pocket with a flap and button. Legs that can be rolled up with a tab and button.
Straight-cut top in a crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a frill trim at the top.

Warm-lined boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details, an ankle-height shaft with a hook and loop fastening at the top, and reflective details. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Tunic in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, side pockets and a belt. Long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Dungarees and a short-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton. Dungarees in woven fabric with buttons at the sides, straps with adjustable buttoning, a chest pocket and concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.Covered elastication at the back of the waist and around the hems. Top in jersey with a press-stud on the shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Shorts in cotton twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and raw-edge frayed hems.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a decorative, tasselled drawstring at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a small collar, cap sleeves, yoke at the back and rounded hem.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with stand-up collar, zip at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Leggings in stretch jersey with a denim look. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a flounce trim at the sides. One pair with an all-over print.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, frill trims at the top, a seam and flared skirt.
Block-coloured T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey. Panel with a text print along the shoulders and sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and slits in the sides of the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short A-line dress in a cotton weave with gathered tiers on the skirt. Square neckline front and back and short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems. Unlined.
Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy cotton weave with elastication at the shoulders, buttons at the front and 3/4-length balloon sleeves with cuffs.
Push-up lace and mesh bralette with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Sleeveless playsuit in a soft viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a flounce at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and wide legs.
Dress in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar with gathers and a V-neck opening at the front. Concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, short raglan sleeves and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Vest tops in soft organic cotton slub jersey with gathered frills around the armholes.
Cable-knit jumper in a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft velour with appliqués and embroidery and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, and regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Hard plastic smartphone case with a selfie light in two places. Built-in battery. USB 2.0 charging cable included. Fits iPhone 6/7. The cable is only for charging and synchronisation via a computer.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an opening and ties at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trainer socks in a pattern-knit cotton blend.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with a decorative lace trim and bow at the top, and press-studs at the crotch.
Cropped, fitted top in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt and shorts. Jersey T-shirt with short slits in the sides. Cotton shorts with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Jersey linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Fitted shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Straight-cut shirt in cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Two open chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Boots in imitation leather with a decorative welt seam around the soles, padding around the top of the shaft and lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3 cm.
Straight-cut jacket in pattern-weave fabric with notch lapels and buttons down the front. Flap welt front pockets, an inner pocket with a button, and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Flock-print tights with an elasticated waist and space for a growing tummy.

Bootees in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Elastication at the back of the heels and a hook and loop fastening at the front of the shaft. Soft fleece linings and insoles and soft soles. The bootees have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Slim-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), and a zip fly and button. Coin pocket, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with a lined funnel collar with a decorative drawstring at the front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Dresses in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), a gathered yoke front and back and short puff sleeves.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, belt in braided imitation suede, zip fly and press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Suit trousers in a stretch cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and slightly shorter legs. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in a viscose and cotton weave containing some linen with a V-neck, buttons at the front, a detachable tie belt at the waist and long, wide legs.
Tiered skirt in a striped cotton weave with smocking at the waist. Unlined.
Metal rings in various designs.
Aqua shoes in scuba fabric with a loop front and back, and textured thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Hat knitted in soft cotton with sewn-on ears at the top, embroidery on the front and a ribbed hem.

Ankle-length kaftan in an airy, heavily draping jacquard weave with a shimmering metallic pattern. V-neck, short sleeves with a small slit and fine fringing, and an asymmetric hem. Fine fringing around the edges.

Padded parka in cotton canvas with a stand-up collar and detachable hood with a decorative drawstring. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, chest and side pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, and a zipped pocket on one sleeve. Elastication at the cuffs and a single back vent. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Track jacket in sturdy jersey with a lined, drawstring hood, zip down the front and long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Tights with an elasticated waist and invisible reinforcement at the toes. 20 denier.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved, straight-cut shirt in an organic cotton weave with two chest pockets, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a fake fly, front and back pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.
